response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could greatly enhance your experience or productivity. Given its quality and features, I'm confident it's worth more than its face value of $150. Considering the value it can bring to you, I propose a special introductory price of $180. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an excellent opportunity to secure this item at a reasonable premium. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 180}
